casebody.data:
No. 09-770. The Boston Teachers Union, Local 66, et al., Petitioners v. Commonwealth Employment Relations Board, et al. 559 U.S. 992, 130 S. Ct. 1738,

176 L. Ed. 2d 213,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2303. March 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appeals Court of Massachusetts denied.

Same case below, 74 Mass. App. 500, 908 N.E.2d 772.
